10//10 I love making out with a killer while he penetrates with his/her meat-hook.

[h1]Dead by Campers[/h1]
This game is all about camping and tunneling, and developers even encourage and reward this mentality with daily quests and perks.

[i][h3]Check out my profile for a collection of campers. [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/yeafkitri/screenshots/?appid=381210&sort=newestfirst&browsefilter=myfiles&view=imagewall][u]Enjoy![/u][/url][/h3][/i]

[h2]Worst matchmaking and ranking system[/h2]
Your rank represent nothing more, but the free time you have and invested in this game. Trust me, after those hours I'm still bad.

[h2]Game breaking bugs still present[/h2]
You can still get stuck, since the release day, but hey! There's always a new outfit, that no one asked for.

[h3]This could have been a good game, but meh...[/h3]

When one of my friends recommended this game to me, I thought they were crazy. I've never been big on the horror genre, and many of my friends know I'm an absolute chicken. I was never going to give it a shot, but somehow I convinced myself to buy it back in July of 2019 when it went on sale. At first, I thought it was super scary, especially going against killers like The Spirit and Ghost Face. The more I played, the more I started to enjoy horror, and now I've started branching into watching the movies any of the licensed killers come from.

The killer designs in this game are great (don't believe me take a look at the Oni and then look at his Minotaur skin), and with the inclusion of The Archives, I find myself interested in knowing how everyone suddenly was pulled into the Entity's trials, killer and survivor alike. There's abilities for everyone's play style, so you can make your own build and work with it. The inclusion of the chase music over the last year or so has really made it feel like I'm being immersed into an actual horror movie as I'm chased. Also, the inclusion of some of the most well known murdering machines like Michael Meyers, Freddy Krueger, Pyramid Head, and the Demogorgon is just down right cool.

They also have special events they do throughout the year such as The Hallowed Blight, where your favorite killer will probably get a skin where they've got glowing serum oozing out of their skin from various tubes. There's also a christmas event where everyone gets a neat little christmas sweater or terrifying skin if you're the killer. There's also a Lunar New Year event and a big Anniversary event done in May to celebrate another year of DBD. You can get some of the skins for free depending on what the event has you do, which is great because the killer cosmetics for them are dope. 

The game does have its moments where things get a little wonky and broken, and you'll get frustrated when the killer hits you through a pallet or vault for the 100th time that day despite stunning them, and you'll hate being tunneled off the hook or being face camped in the basement, but the majority of games won't go that way. It's also a super fun game to play with friends, especially with the inclusion of cross play with Xbox, PS4, and Switch players. My group and I on average play this game for 20-30 hours a week, and we have an absolute blast. 

Solid 9/10 would recommend. Needs more good Nea cosmetics tho.

Nach 250 Stunden ein Kurzes Review zu diesem Spiel:

Um was geht es bei Dead by Daylight? 

Das Ziel der Überlebenden ist die 5 Generatoren die in der Map verteilt sind vollständig zu reparieren,währenddessen gibt es irgendwo in der Map einen Mörder/Killer der die Aufgabe hat alle Überlebenden zu finden und auszuschalten/töten.

Sobald alle 5 Generatoren repariert wurden werden für kurze Zeit 2 Schalter an unterschiedlichen Positionen an der Rand der Map angezeigt,wo sich auch der Ausgang befindet.

Sobald man am Ausgang,bzw Schalter angekommen ist und den vollständig aktiviert hat,hat man die Möglichkeit zu entkommen,oder man hilft jemanden aus dem eigenem Team,bzw versucht ihn zu retten,wenn er sich im Haken befindet.

Beim dritten mal aufhängen ist man übrigens Tot ;)

Positives :
- Kann man gut mit freunden zocken
- Keine extreme Hardware Ansprüche
- Grafik ist in Ordnung 

Negatives :
- Wenn man das Spiel Abends zockt,dauert es viel länger ein Match zu finden
- Paar kleine Bugs

Милая игра, в жанре хоррор (можно подумать прям страшно🙄)
Приятная жутковатая атмосфера подчеркивающаяся не забываемой музыкальной темой. На выбор вам предоставлено несколько охотников: Охотница(Метатель топоров), Траппер( персонаж с переносимыми капканами куда можно сцапать жертву), Деревенщина(молниносный убийца с бензопилой- такой же быстрый как синий еж Соник) и Медсестра( медленная но ловкая из-за особого навыка охотница)
Также на выбор есть и выжившие: каждый по своему уникален и владеет особыми навыками позволяющими им закончить игру прежде, чем охотник совершит свое кровавое возмездие!!!👹
Отдельной похвалы требует музыкальное сопровождение лицензионных охотников из DLC

НО если вы будете игнорировать подобные выходки, то вы принесете в игру капельку доброты и ламповости. Ну прям как я 🤗! Всем приятных игр, запомните, не нужно быть самым агрессивным что бы быть полезным обществу.👋

Dead by Daylight is an asymmetrical horror game that, despite what the vocal community likes to think, does an above average job at balancing gameplay for both sides. Since the release of dedicated servers, the majority of the detection issues that used to plague the game have been rectified, and most major bugs tend to be fixed relatively quickly - of course, this isn't always the case, but it's rare a bug actually ruins the experience nowadays. Would recommend playing survivor with friends and killer otherwise - solo survivor can be a chore, but the game is in general quite fun either way.

Gra wydaje się fajna. Czytasz i oglądasz filmy o grze, aż w końcu kupujesz... grasz jeden mecz i idzie ci do dupy nikogo nawet nie trafiasz, ale się nie przejmujesz ponieważ to pierwszy mecz. Grasz dalej grasz nawet jeszcze nawet 40 meczy i dalej ci idzie do dupy. Każdy kto zaczyna jest noobem i chce stać się prosem, ale się nie da, bo za każdym razem gdy włączasz mecz killerem to przychodzi jedna szmata z latarką i ci świeci cały mecz po ryju i później się śmieje na chcacie noobi killer. A tylko spróbuj grać nurse to dopiero poleje się kwas. ogólnie nie umiem grać killerem, a nie mogę się nauczyć bo każdy mecz = same szmaty z latarami. ocalały jest prosty mam na nim 9 rangę, ale tę grę kupuje się głównie dal mordercy, którym nowy gracz nie może się nauczyć. Wiele osób ma taki problem jak ja i piszą do Behavioru by coś zmienili z comunity, ale oni ani razu nie odpowiadają mają to w dupie i tylko pieniążki liczą. Gra ocalałym jest łatwa jak już wspominałem więc być taką szmatą czyli perfekcyjnie loopować jest łatwo. Wystarczy odpowiedni dobór perków i trochę treningu, ale bardzo mało. Mordercą mam 19 rangę i właśnie na tych rangach spotyka się takich prosów, którzy ganiają się z tobą cały mecz, a jak już ich złapiesz i z chęcią przykampisz to wtedy ukazuje się domena tej gry kwas na chacie.

Bardzo serdecznie odradzam kupna tej gry!

Vamos começar que o jogo em si não se "respeita", ou seja, o jogo conta com altos bugs e uma péssima otimização e, não só isso mas também o jogo não é equilibrado, ou seja, muitas abilidades, perks de killers, são mil vezes melhores do que a dos sobreviventes, e a behavior nem se esforçar pra balancear (pelo menos na época que joguei), sem contar que o jogo pode ser estragado por um killer que utiliza anti-jogo, camperando no seu gancho ou no seu corpo no chão, estragando completamente sua experiência no começo, apenas compre esse jogo caso tenha uma party com seus amigos fechada para jogar, caso contrário, não comprem esse jogo!

Overall this is a great game, but it has two main flaws. First is the wait time. It can take up to 25 minutes to get into a match if you are playing as a killer, but if you are playing as a victim this is not a problem. Secondly is the cost of DLC. I just really wish that they would include a few more killers with the regular version of the game. On the positive side this is by far the best horror game out there and is tons of fun. I have never had any crashes or game malfunctions. I definitley recommend this game!
